message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this unique product. Its value speaks for itself, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a starting price of $1,300,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I recognize your budget constraints, the product's inherent value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. I believe this represents a fair compromise that reflects the product's true worth.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stay within my budget. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1,250,000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence in this negotiation.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers to finalize the deal. I propose a final price of $1,262,500.  This reflects my desire to reach an agreement while acknowledging the product's significant value.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1,255,000. I hope this proposal will be more favorable to both parties.
